content: Themed boxes for guys that give a damn, delivered monthly. They’re packed with seriously high-quality, seriously unique goods that add up to way more than $45 – in fact, they’re always worth at least $70, and usually quite a bit more.

Go off the grid without forgoing the comforts of home by moving into the Greenmoxie tiny house. This eco-friendly 340-square-foot home makes use of every inch of its compact layout to provide every amenity you’d desire, from electricity to a fully functional bathroom.

Brighten up your personal space with some gamer flair using this neat Crash Bandicoot TNT light. Styled exactly like the TNT boxes from the classic game, it emits a striking orange glow and even plays the exploding crate sound effect when turned on.

No matter how rough and rugged the terrain, the Ariel Nomad tactical buggy will get you to where you want to go. This off-road capable ride is lightweight and boats a 233 horsepower Honda VTEC engine that will let you reach 60 miles per hour in just 3.5 seconds.

This throwable flower vase fire extinguisher will help keep you safe while blending into your home’s decor. This Molotov-cocktail-styled extinguisher is designed so that it can easily be thrown from a safe distance to quell the flames and stop the fire from spreading.

Make a fashion statement with your timepiece by accenting your outfit with one of these fabulous Bulova Computron LED watches. They feature a unique and futuristic looking trapezoidal case that is available in either a gold, black, or a stainless steel finish.

He said NO to drugs, brought Gorbachev and the sinister U.S.S.R. down to their knees, and invented Reaganomics. Now you can show your patriotism by commemorating the greatness of the 40th president with the Ronald Reagan riding a velociraptor painting.

Airbnb is giving one extremely lucky person the chance to spend an unforgettable night at the Louvre. The winner will get the VIP treatment as they sleep beneath the iconic pyramid as well as get to enjoy a series of exclusive tours of the iconic landmark.

Imagine how much fun it would be to soar the open skies aboard the Trek Aerospace FK2 Flying Go-Kart! This insane concept ride features a design with a centralized pilots seat surrounded by a slew of ducted fans meant to propel the craft into the air.

To celebrate the start of the Reiwa era and the Enthronement of Emperor Naruhito, The Oak Door restaurant has introduced this delicious monstrosity. This one-of-a-kind burger comes stuffed with everything from Wagyu beef slices to foie gras, and black truffles.

Transform your next soak into a relaxing Technicolor dreamscape with this rainbow bath bomb. Upon being dropped into your tub, the white cloud-shaped bomb begins to leave brilliant rainbow streaks as it dissolves into the water.

Digital designer Mo Aoun has reimagined what Rivian’s all-electric R1S SUV would look like as a rugged National Forests patrol vehicle. This green and mean SUV will boast 750 horsepower along with a 400+ mile range.

Get a chance to follow in the footsteps of the great Clark Griswold by placing your bid on this replica station wagon from the classic Nation Lampoon’s Vacation flick. This movie-accurate replica is the perfect ride for any road warrior looking for the adventure of a lifetime!

Turn heads when walking down the street in these D&G melted slime soles sneakers. These extraordinarily designed slip-on kicks feature an incredibly bright artisan-poured liquid thermoplastic material that makes them look like they’re covered in a fashionable slime.

Send a loud and clear message to anyone thinking about sneaking a sip of your hooch by storing it in this middle finger whiskey decanter. This conversation piece comes in a set that includes the decanter, 2 tumbler glasses, 6 whiskey stones, and a wooden base.

SuperEight is the savory craft beer from Dogfish Head and Kodak that can actually be used to develop film! This unique brew features a pH level that is low enough to develop Kodak’s Super 8 film – making this the ideal brew for photographers and beer connoisseurs alike.

With hopes of revolutionizing air travel, NASA and MIT have joined forces to produce this Morphing Wing concept. Unlike traditional aircrafts, it is designed to change shape mid-flight in order to allow for greater control of the aircraft’s trajectory.

This flaming basketball hoop will give an entirely new meaning to being on fire when you’re shooting some hoops. It comes with an easy mounting bracket ideal for placing on any door and features a special rim that bursts into flames after you sink in 3 shots.

They say you should never bring a knife to a gun fight, unless you’re armed with this built-in revolver bayonet knife. This intriguing bayonet conceals a .22 LR six shot revolver within the handle and is designed to fit perfectly on an M16/AR15 with a standard military configuration.

Experience total mayhem by having a real-life battle royale with your friends using these Takara Tomy X-Tag light guns. It combines online multiplayer FPS and laser tag and even comes equipped with a smartphone mount so that you can easily connect and play wirelessly.

The world’s largest T-Rex fossil has been unearthed and is changing what was previously thought about this legendary predator. Thought to have weighed around 19,500lbs, this 65% complete fossil includes the skull and hips along with parts of the ribs and legs bones.

After a long hiatus, Lucky Charms marshmallow-only cereal is back! This incredible and magically delicious cereal throws some little whimsical unicorn marshmallows into the mix and will be handed out as a prize to 15,000 lucky contest winners.

Calling all gearheads, this gorgeous 1968 Shelby Mustang GT 500 can be yours for the right price! Up for auction, this classic ride boasts some serious horsepower along with an incredible 440 ft-lbs of torque and staggered rear shocks for improved stability.

The vacation home of the future has arrived in the form of the Skydome cabin. This Russian creation reinvents the standard cabin layout in favor of a spacious spherical shape available in six variations ranging in size from 365 to 3,229 square feet.

This Alien Xenomorph Pikachu is one of the most adorably terrifying creatures you’ll ever see. Sold directly through the artist’s site, this sinister looking rodent-sized resin mashup stands about 4-inches tall and makes the perfect little gift for both Pokemon and Aliens fans alike.

Escape the monotony of everyday life by hitting the open road behind the wheel of an Honest Camper adventure van. These rentable rolling homes come fully tricked-out with all the essentials necessary for a thrilling life on the road.

You’d be crazy NOT to drink out of a mug that doesn’t have your beautiful face plastered all over it! These heat reactive mugs can be customized with any face you want, and make the perfect gift idea for someone who truly loves themselves!

Gain a deeper understanding of the vastness of the cosmos by gazing at this Megastar Class home planetarium. Despite its small size, it projects in all directions so you can see around 1 million nearby stars – and also offers dusk, dawn and blue sky mood lighting.

Make a statement at your upcoming nuptials by ditching the sweets and indulging in this mammoth 24-pound cheese wedding cake. This towering treat features layer after layer of premium artisan cheese that’ll feed up to 150 hopefully-not-lactose-intolerant guests.

Apart from designing some jaw-dropping rides for Aston Martin, Carrozzeria Zagato also worked with Fiat to produce rides like this 1955 Fiat 8V Coupé Zagato. This vintage racing vehicle competed in events throughout the ’70s and has since been restored to its former glory.

These uniquely designed 3D printed speakers turn sand into incredible sound that’ll fill your room while adding to its decor. It’s equipped with a 3-inch fulll-range driver that provides a frequency response of 75 to 20,000Hz with minimal distortion.

Journal 29 is a unique book game with puzzles: solve the puzzles submit your answers online get the keys and move forward. To solve the puzzles, you need to think out of the box, write, draw, fold and more. Journal 29 is an escape room in a book.

Is your car vulnerable to keyless car theft? KeyBlock is similar to current Faraday pouches that block all RFID signals, preventing thieves from gaining access to your car without a key. Additionally, KeyBlock’s design has some awesome new features!

This breathtaking full-scale LEGO McLaren Senna is a testament to what can be done with a little focus and dedication. Composed of 480,000 pieces, this incredible 1:1 scale vehicle was put together by 30 talented assemblers during a period of nearly 5,000 hours.

Virtual Reality takes another leap forward with the Oculus Rift S VR headset. It boasts a per-eye resolution of 1280 x 1440 and comes with 5 onboard tracking cameras along with updated LCD screens and near-ear speakers for an incredibly immersive experience.

With its incredibly diminutive size, the Le Chiquito bag takes high-end fashion to new heights! Created by French design house Jacquemus, this reasonably priced accent piece offers loads of storage capacity and can either be dressed up or down to match your style.

Whether you’re up against a horde of zombies or just want to work on your aim, the Cobra tactical repeating crossbow will get the job done. It features an AR-15-inspired adjustable stock, has a 130-pound draw weight, and can fire an arrow at 270 fps.

The Traveler XL tiny house delivers all the modern comforts you’ve come to expect from a traditional home for a fraction of the price. Despite its small size, this intelligently designed home comes with a full bathroom, kitchen, and a surprisingly spacious bedroom.

The FedEx SameDay delivery robot is the hard working bot willing to go the distance – literally – to ensure a speedy delivery and total satisfaction. It travels through sidewalks and comes equipped with a series of cameras that help it avoid obstacles as it makes its way to you.

Only a handful of humans have ventured to the deepest parts of the ocean. The Triton Hadal Underwater Exploration System aims to change that and is currently on a worldwide expedition with hopes of reaching the deepest point in each of the wold’s five oceans.

Tap is an all-in-one Bluetooth super controller designed to streamline the way you interact with your devices. From computers to smartphones to VR headsets and more, Tap puts you in control using simple finger inputs on any surface.

Located on the Norwegian coastline, the Snøhetta underwater restaurant offers a dining experience like no other. The large dining area features an 11 x 4 meter panoramic acrylic window that treats guests to breath-taking underwater vistas while they dine.

Shareholders rejoice! Apple’s endgame of taking everyone’s money has finally come to fruition with the introduction of the Apple credit card. This interest accruing status symbol features contactless payments, and provides extremely detailed spending reports.

titleEN: Game Of Thrones Chocolate Dragon Eggs
content: Celebrate the premiere of the long awaited final season in true Targaryen fashion with these delectable chocolate dragon eggs. These eye-catching and mouth-watering treats are made from creamy white chocolate and are hand painted to look just like dragon eggs.

No matter that excursion you have in mind, the Yamaha Wabash adventure gravel E-bike will handle it with ease. It boasts a 500-watt battery, an electric drive system with 4 levels of pedal assist, and an on-board display that provides pertinent riding info like speed and distance.

titleEN: A Plot Of Land On The Sun
content: In these trying economic times, it’s more important than ever to make wise investment decisions – that’s why you need to purchase your plot of land on the Sun before there’s no more space left on our solar system’s hottest property!

PorTable is your new adventure companion that functions as a lightweight, foldable, transportable table that powers your devices anywhere to stay connected. Share music with built-in speakers, and stay prepared with a replaceable power bank & much more!

The Desert Storm Trophy Truck is the ruggedly awesome 4 x 4 that will make you look like the most badass driver this side of the Mississippi. It boasts a top-class suspension system, a roll cage, and most notably an imposing and head-turning aerodynamic body.

Believe it or not, some Chinese multi-millionaire out there has actually paid over one million dollars for a pigeon. This prized Belgian racing pigeon is named Armando and is considered to be the best long distance racing pigeon of all time.

Look like the coolest kid on the block in these Toy Story Pizza Planet sneakers. These comfy kicks feature a Polyurethane upper with a rubber sole and display a stylish design based on the Pizza Planet restaurant chain from the beloved Pixar movie.

Why stand when you can sit?! Designed in a joint effort from Sir Mix-A-Lot and The Snuggie company, the bean bag onesie gives you some seriously flattering junk in the trunk so that at a moment’s notice you can have a round mound of plush seating!

Learn about the world around you with this scientifically accurate flat Earth snow globe. This incredibly life-like replica depicts how our planet actually looks like – unlike that bloated marble-like object “scientists” and other pseudo-intellectuals claim the Earth is actually like.

Kirby’s hunger is never-ending. He’s inhaled enemies, friends, blocks, bricks, and food. But he’s never truly satisfied. He wants more! He wants… to clean your house. It’s voice activated and compatible with a variety of smart home hubs.

Fisker is looking to reinvent the SUV and usher it into the future with their all-new all-electric SUV. Apart from its sleek futuristic design, this competitively priced ride will have a range of 300 miles and is expected to hit the streets in 2021.

Class up your game room by upgrading your wooden board to this elegant marble chess set. This exquisite set is handcrafted entirely from white Italian Carrara and black Spanish Nero Marquina marble and includes both a gameboard and 32 classically styled pieces.

The Dirigo 2 is the ultralight backpacking tent that shelters you from the elements without weighing you down. This three-season tent is made from the ultra durable and lightweight Dyneema fabric and is large enough to sleep two.

Make your yard look just like a level from Super Mario with these Goomba garden statues. This geeky piece of garden decor is crafted from durable resin and stands at only eight inches, making it ultra portable and perfect for placing nearly anywhere.

The Senna GTR Hypercar is McLaren’s most extreme track car to date. This lightweight track-only car boasts an impressive 4.0-liter twin-turbocharged V8 with 813 horses of power and has a power-to-weight ratio of 694 bhp-per ton.

Celebrate the life of the late Stephen Hawking by adding this special edition coin to your collection. It’s double the weight of the silver Proof 50p coin and it is the first in a new series of coins designed to celebrate innovators in the field of science.

The BolaWrap 100 is the remote restraint device that shoots out an 8-foot bola style tether at 640 feet per second and wraps around the assailant’s legs and ankles around 1 to 3 times in order to stop them dead on their tracks.

Set your content apart from the rest by creating incredible and professional quality videos with the EVO foldable 3D 360° camera. The camera can either capture 360° 2D video when it is folded up or 180° 3D video when it is opened flat.

Oceanco’s latest project, the Esquel Expedition yacht is the 345-foot long diesel-electric vessel that is designed for those who want to explore some of our planet’s most remote and secluded locations without leaving the lap of luxury.

titleEN: Apple AirPods Glow In The Dark Case
content: With this glow in the dark Apple AirPods case at your disposal you’ll never again have trouble finding your headphones in a poorly lit room. This high quality case provides 360-degree protection while also emitting a bright green glow.

Pint is the new, compact, and affordable self-balancing electric skateboard that will make you look forward to your daily commute. It’s around 15% smaller than the Plus model, has a range of 8 miles, and a top speed of 16 miles per hour.

To mark the 90th anniversary of Mickey and Minnie Mouse’s debut LEGO has released this must-have Steamboat Willie set. The set includes everything you’ll need to construct your very own S.S. Willie – including Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse minifigs.

Keep your home safe without sacrificing style by swapping your tacky red eyesore of an extinguisher for this wine bottle fire extinguisher. The clever design tastefully disguises the handy extinguisher like a giant bottle of wine.

La Moto Volante 496 is the flying motorcycle that will conquer both land and air! This insane-looking ride boasts a massive 470 horsepower V8 alongside a set of four jet turbine wheels which open outward so that the bike can take flight.

Melt your cares away with an ultra relaxing hydro-massage session courtesy of the Aquatica Nexus Spa. This top-of-the-line spa is fitted with 20 hydro-massage jets, 8 air nozzles, and features a minimalist and modern design that makes it ideal for both indoor or outdoor use.

Treat everyone driving behind you to an action-packed wrestling match by outfitting your ride with these brawling wrestlers windshield wipers. The hilarious and clever design of these wipers makes them the perfect car accessory for anyone who loves lucha libre!

The world’s first 1TB microSD cards have arrived! Both Micron and SanDisk are releasing MicroSD cards with an unheard of storage capacity of 1TB. Each of these MicroSDs will also be A2 certified which means you’ll be able to insert them into your smartphone.

Gain a new appreciation for nature by getting a bird’s-eye view of some breathtaking vistas by paying a visit to the Camp Adventure park. The trail begins at a 900 meter long path that starts at the forest floor and ends at a spectacular 45 meter tall observation tower.

titleEN: Mercedes Benz Formula E Race Car
content: Mercedes Benz is sure to make a splash in the all-electric racing circuit when it unveils the EQ Silver Arrow 01. This Formula E Race Car will boast a 52kWh battery pack and will be able to go from 0 – 60 in just 2.7 seconds and reach a top speed of 174 mph.

If you’re looking to disconnect and become one with nature, the Crystal Peak Lookout has got you covered. This secluded getaway is nestled high among the tree tops and comes with amenities like an indoor fireplace and a cozy wood fired sauna.

The days of the consoles wars may finally be coming to an end with the introduction of Google’s Stadia cloud-based gaming platform! It provides near-instant streaming of games at 60 FPS in 4K HDR across all your devices, with zero high-end hardware needed!

Soon you may be able to interact, play, and work alongside your favorite Dunder Mifflin employees thanks to LEGO Ideas member theoffice_lego. This amazingly detailed LEGO MOC is composed of over 2,100 pieces and measures 17″ x 19″.

This Alexa enabled robotic lawn mower from Husqvarna is the ultimate in smart lawn care. This little mower will diligently work for up to 100 minutes on a single charge and comes loaded with handy features like voice-activated control with Amazon Alexa and Google Home.

Make your awesome wizard ensemble come to life with one of these magic wizard staffs. You can either choose the eye-catching Chaos Staff that produces 3,000 Btu’s of fireball casting fury or the Fog Staff that releases an eerie mist from the crystal ball located at the top.

With their eye on the future of personal transportation, Goodyear has introduced this revolutionary flying car concept tire. The Goodyear AERO is a 2-in-1 tire meant to work both for driving on the road and as a propeller for flying the friendly skies.

The Hololens 2 mixed reality headset from Microsoft will transform the world around you into a virtual playground. It will feature a new display system for more vibrant holograms that are refined through a time-of-flight depth sensor to enable direct manipulation of them.

Give your bathroom a wow factor by straying away from the norm and opting for this marvelous concrete bathtub. This imposing bathtub is designed and handmade utilizing natural cement with a special top class finish that protects and keeps the surface silky smooth.

With the hopes of continuing the exploration of our moon, Toyota and JAXA (the Japanese version of NASA) have joined forces to bring forth this lunar rover concept. This manned and pressurized rover would feature a cruising range of more than 6,200 miles.

Escape the hustle and bustle of the land by moving into the Naturecruiser floating houseboat. Apart from a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, and outdoor deck, the home boasts solar panels and a water purification system that make it practically self-sufficient.

Jetpack Aviation is ushering civilization into the future of personal transportation with their flying motorcycle. With a design reminiscent of a Star Wars speeder bike, this revolutionary new ride can whiz through the air at 150 mph and reach a maximum altitude of 15,000 feet.

Take your pet obsession from cute to creepy by becoming your feline friend with one of these realistic furry cat masks. Shindo Rinka is the Japanese creative company that is making these custom and hyper realistic cat masks complete with faux fur and whiskers.

Instantly create a magical nighttime atmosphere using this real fire tornado lamp. This unique lighting fixture combines nature and modern technology to produce a stunning visual display as the small but majestic fire twister dances gracefully inside the metallic cylinder.

The newest fleet of expedition cruises from Norwegian cruise provider Hurtigruten are the world’s first battery powered hybrid vessels, making them perfect for environmentally conscious adventure seekers who want to explore our planet’s most remote locations.

Bring style and tranquility to any room in your humble abode with this gorgeous glass bonsai tree. This stunningly beautiful work of art is part of a collection of equally gorgeous pieces, painstakingly created by the superbly talented Italian artist Simone Crestani.

Bring your dull living room decor to life by hanging up this living moss wall art. This vibrant piece of living art features a sea of preserved moss encased by a sleek wood and metal frame that creates a brilliant contrast against the lively green moss inside.

Master the art of loving your bedroom by going through the pages of the IKEA Kama Sutra. Portrayed as the “ultimate guide to bedroom satisfaction” this digital catalog comes packed with an abundance of brilliant bedroom layouts complete with gorgeous illustrations.

Make sleeping with the fishes something to get excited about by booking your stay at this shark aquarium underwater bedroom through Airbnb. You’ll get to spend the night completely submerged in a 3 million liter aquarium, surrounded by 35 majestic sharks.

Tesla is looking to enter the mid-sized crossover SUV market with their new Tesla Model Y. With a range of 300 miles, it will be able to do 0-60 in just 3.5 seconds and will also offer features like 66 cubic feet of cargo space, autopilot mode, and a panoramic glass roof.

What better way to hydrate during those grueling gaming sessions than with this ingeniously designed Donkey Kong barrel mug? Although it’s not dishwasher or microwave safe, this mug is perfect for any cold or room temperature beverage.

The Lamborghini Hurracan Evo Spyder is the exotic car that turns driving into a thrill ride. This stunning 631 horsepower vehicle tops out at 201 miles per hour and features a sleek aerodynamic body topped off with a convertible top that retracts in just 17 seconds.

If you’re fascinated by ancient life you’ll love adding this real Spinosaurus tooth to your collection of fossils. Each specimen consists of the complete crown and partial root of a Spinosaurus tooth and comes encased in an elegant glass-topped Riker box.

Enjoy the comforts of home when you’re out on the road by hitting the trail behind the wheel of a Global X expedition vehicle. Each rugged ride can be customized with the chassis, body model, and floor layout of your choice to suit your particular needs.

LG’s smartphone dual screen attachment will forever change the way you use your smartphone. This handy attachment essentially doubles your screen size and offers a complete 360 degree rotation – making it ideal for everything from gaming to surfing the web.

Cut out the middle man by growing some premium medicine from the comfort of home using this cannabis grow system. This compact gadget fits easily in any room and allows you to constantly monitor your plants for premium results.

This modified Nissan Energy Roam Woodworking Van is a carpenter’s dream come true. Nissan and Studio Hardie teamed up to create this magnificent mobile workshop that comes equipped with everything from its own power grid to a rail-mounted swivel shop stool.

This wooden camp mug is the traditional Nordic mug that should be part of every outdoorsman’s pack. This gorgeous mug is hand carved from a solid chunk of natural wood and sports an ergonomic handle with dual finger holes for a more secure hold.

Train for the upcoming zombie apocalypse like never before with the 5K zombie survival marathon that will be coming to a city near you! This one-of-a-kind marathon includes obstacle courses as well as endless zombies scattered throughout the marathon.

The Shift S1 folding electric bike is the ultra-portable ride perfect for your weekday commute. It comes with a long-lasting on-board battery with a 15 mile range and a 350 Watt motor that will let you cruise comfortably a 20 miles per hour.

titleEN: Star Wars Episode IV Stormtrooper Blaster
content: This Star Wars Episode IV Stormtrooper blaster is the ultimate collectible for any die-hard fan of the beloved film series. This piece of cinematic history was made by the legendary cinema weaponry manufacturer Bapty for the original Star Wars film.

The all-new Toyota RAV4 TRD off-road was made for those who take the road less traveled. This 203 horsepower ride comes equipped with a reworked suspension for improved handling over rough trails, an 8-speed transmission and lightweight alloy wheels.

Take back control of your inbox with Leave Me Alone. This easy-to-use spam killer allows you to see all of your spam, newsletters, and subscription emails in one place and unsubscribe from them with a single click and without any security risk to you.

The stunning Ferrari F8 Tributo coupe is the modern reincarnation of the iconic 488. The Tributo will boast a 710 horsepower 3.9-liter twin-turbo – allowing this sleek speed demon to do 0 to 62 in just 2.9 seconds and hit a top speed of 211 miles per hour!

Brighten up your little princess’s world with some whimsical lighting by installing this unicorn sconce wall light in her room. This battery operated light comes with a built-in back slot for easy installation and emits a lovely multicolored light from his cute little rainbow horn.

This Nintendo Flex concept is industrial designer YJ Yoon’s vision of the classic Game Boy redesigned for the new millennium. It would feature a sleeker and more compact body with streamlined controls and would play games that are accessed through a USB-C-based pen.

The Nubia Alpha is the flexible smartphone that you can wear on your wrist! This dust and water-resistant phone boasts a flexible 4″ OLED display and comes equipped with multiple built-in sensors that will track everything from your vitals to your sleeping pattern.

La Voiture Noire is the insanely powerful and ultra-rare ride the iconic auto manufacturer built to commemorate their 110th anniversary. This one-off vehicle was built entirely by hand and sold to one extremely lucky collector for a whopping 19 million dollars!

Satisfy your need for speed by leaving behind the family sedan and hitting the open road in this authentic Morgan three wheeler. This fun little number is powered by a 2.0 liter 80 hp S&S V-twin engine for a 0 to 60 time of just 4.5 seconds and a top speed of 115 mph.

If you’re an experienced rider with a serious need for adventure and speed the Pantera off-road electric skateboard is just for you. This 10.7 hp ride can reach a heart-pumping speed of 45 miles per hour and travel up to 28 miles on a single charge.

titleEN: Original Sealed Super Mario Bros Game
content: This original sealed Super Mario Bros. game just sold for a whopping $100,150! This ultra rare and “sticker sealed” copy is in such great condition that it was given a “near mint” grade of 9.4 and a “seal rating” of A++ by Wata Games.

The Samsung Galaxy Fold is going to revolutionize the smartphone game! Apart from functioning as a regular smartphone, Samsung’s latest product will be able to unfold – like a book – to reveal a tablet sized 7.3-inch screen ideal for streaming videos.

Rod Emory specializes in building and customizing vintage Porsches like this stunning AWD 1964 Porsche 356 C4S Coupe. This unique ride has the body of a 356. with the components of a 1990 911 C4 – making it perfect for both city and country roads.

Reap the soothing benefits of hemp oil during your next coffee break by serving yourself a piping hot cup of Willie Nelson’s CBD infused coffee. This medium-dark blend is infused with Colorado-grown organic hemp oil and has flavor notes of cherry and cocoa.

Get nostalgic during happy hour by wetting your whistle with a refreshing can of Saturday Morning marshmallow beer. This very limited edition Lucky Charms-inspired craft beer is actually brewed with in-house toasted marshmallows and bulk dehydrated-marshmallow-bits.

Usher your home or office into the future with the HTC 5G Hotspot smart hub. This highly versatile device not only replaces your Wi-Fi router – allowing you to deliver wireless Internet to up to 20 devices simultaneously – but also functions as a handy tablet as well.

Enjoy the company of one of TV’s most beloved personalities by adding this Bob Ross action figure to your collection. This fully articulated and expertly designed action figure is crafted from plastic and measures 8″ from his boots to the top of his groovy ‘fro.

titleEN: Super Mario Fire Flower Garden Statue
content: Add some color and geeky flair to your home with this cute little Super Mario Fire Flower garden statue. This adorable little flower stands nearly a foot tall and is made entirely out of resin which makes it ideal for either indoor or outdoor use.

Go from cruising over asphalt to gliding over water without having to change vehicles while riding atop the motorcycle jet ski hybrid. This versatile ride features a two cylinder engine able to hit 80 mph on land and transitions from bike to ski in just 5 seconds.

Lamborghini has recently announced that they are planning to release a one-make racing series for their Urus SUV. The ST-X SUV will boast a 640 hp twin-turbo V8 and center lock wheels that facilitate tire changing in addition to other racing features like a roll cage.

Why settle for a boring cabinet when you can stash your symphony of spirits in style inside of the cellist cocktail bar? This seemingly run-of-the-mill instrument opens up to reveal a neat little bar with room for several bottles and even a few drinking glasses as well.

Why settle for mere solid gold or silver when you can seal the deal in style with one of these men’s wedding bands from Wallis Reid? Each band features an abstract design composed of fused solid 18K gold and oxidized silver to create an alluring one-of-kind design.

Leave your audience with their jaws on the floor as you defy the laws of physics with this Sharpie playing card magic trick. You’ll leave your captivated audience stunned as you somehow manage to move a Sharpie marker through a card without tearing it to pieces.

Explore one of our planet’s last unspoiled frontiers without forgoing the comforts of home by staying at the Arctic Treehouse Hotel. Each cozy suite comes with large front-facing windows that give you a front row seat to the majestic wilderness and Northern Lights.

As crazy as it sounds, there’s a new reversible male contraceptive that was inspired by cocktails. Scientists have developed a way to inject layers of materials that are designed to block the vas deferens from letting sperm make their way to the testes and urethra.

This winter, give your pint-size adrenaline junkie the thrill of their short little lives with this kids electric snow mobile. Naseka is the versatile all-season ride that can be utilized as either a scooter or a snow mobile – making it perfect for year-round use.

The Flying Amphibious Boat is an adrenaline junkie’s dream come true. Despite its simple design, this blood-pumping thrill ride can seamlessly transition from water to air, reach a top speed of 50 mph, and carry a load of almost 400 lbs!

In their attempt to one-up the competition, Dodge has introduced a multifuction tailgate for all 7 of their Ram models. The MultiPro tailgate will offer dual side-hinged doors that let you choose from 4 different configurations: open flat, left open only, right open only, and both open.

Why waste money on insignificant things like your kid’s college funds when you can invest it wisely in something like this pure gold Casio G-Shock watch? Every single piece of this alluring watch is cast from solid 18 karat gold!

If you’re the type that values style and aesthetics over actual comfort this Moon Chaise lounge chair is ideal for your humble abode. The exterior of this artfully designed and hand-crafted piece is made entirely from aluminum and covered with gold leaf to create a truly radiant look.

Whether you’re looking to quickly clear up some trees or simply decimate a horde of ravenous zombies, the backpack chainsaw is the right tool for the job! The clever design allows for even load distribution so that you can take care of business in total comfort.

Guarantee that no harm comes to your electronic devices when you venture outdoors by placing them inside the Pelican weatherproof utility case. It comes available in 3 sizes and is large enough to store everything from first aid supplies to your smartphone.

Get a front row seat to what lies hidden underneath the ocean’s surface by hopping aboard the Looker 370 glass bottom boat! The uniquely designed bottom is perfect for those want to see the underwater world but aren’t necessarily too keen on the idea of jumping in.

Simply put, the Vandal One track car was conceived to be the most advanced performance vehicle in the world. This stunning ride puts out over 560 hp at 9,000 rpm which give it a power-to-weight ratio that nearly doubles that of the Bugatti Veyron.

Instantly create a soothing ambiance in your bedroom by flicking on this Minecraft lava lamp. Though it may not be able to fuel your furnace, this officially licensed lamp puts out a soft warm glow that creates a soothing environment perfect for lulling you into a deep sleep.

Give snack-time a boozy twist that’ll send your taste buds to heaven by snacking on a pint of Häagen-Dazs booze-infused ice cream. Each pint has less than 0.5% alcohol by volume and comes in savory flavors like “rum tres leches” and “stout chocolate pretzel crunch”.

Zip around your concrete jungle more efficiently than ever by upgrading your old school bike to the Novus electric bike. It features a top speed of 62 mph and boasts a sleek and hollow frame that keeps the bike’s weight at a very manageable 85 pounds.

Claw is the world’s smallest multi-tool! Providing functionality and minimalism, it can pop bottles, light fires, undo screws and so much more all while sizing up at just under one inch of the finest Aerospace grade titanium!

The Passerine Sparrow is the unique delivery drone that takes a cue from nature and uses a pair of jumping legs to take off and land. This fixed wing aircraft sports a pair of over-the-wing engines in addition to two spring-loaded legs that allow it to easily take off and land.

Add some retro 8-bit-styled flair to your coffee routine by serving your hot beverage in this Super Mario Bros. pipe mug. This vibrant mug may not be able to magically transport you to another world, but it’ll do a bang up job at keeping your coffee or tea piping hot.

titleEN: Honda Rugged Open Air Vehicle Concept
content: This rugged open air vehicle concept is Honda’s vision of what the ultimate off-roading adventure ride would look like. It was developed by Honda R&D Americas and combines aspects of the Honda Ridgeline pickup and the Honda Pioneer 1000 for a truly unique ride.

Give your poor body just what it needs after a hard and stressful day by dropping one of these CBD bath bombs into your tub. The organic essential oils and cannabis oil combine to provide a soothing experience ideal for relieving sore muscles and aching bones.

titleEN: Henn Na Hotel Robot Staffed Hotel
content: The Henn-na Hotel chain has set themselves apart from the competition by replacing nearly all of their human employees with a high-tech robot staff that interacts with guests to create a futuristic and unique experience they won’t soon forget.

Increase your home’s fun factor without straying away from its elegant decor by bringing in this curved base pool table from 11 Ravens. This imposing piece forgoes the standard four-legged base for a remarkably stylish and aesthetically pleasing curved base.

If you have trouble falling asleep at night, then the Capser self-dimming smart night light is just what you need! This bedside light emits a soft warm glow that gradually dims over a period of 45 minutes to help lull you into a calming and deep sleep.

If you’ve grown bored of riding around on those self balancing scooters and hoverboards give yourself a real challenge with the Segway Ninebot One wheel scooter. Weighing just 25 pounds, this fun ride comes with a 15 mile range and can reach a top speed of 12.5 mph.

Say goodbye to the plebeian task of scrubbing toilets for good by leaving the dirty work to the toilet cleaning robot. Designed to fit standard toilets, Giddel will efficiently and diligently scrub all the hard to reach spots, for a toilet bowl so clean you can eat of off!

LG has unveiled the world’s first rollable OLED TV and it looks absolutely stunning! Equipped with a second generation Alpha 9 intelligent processor, it delivers unsurpassed image quality, offers 3 viewing modes, and can conveniently be rolled down when it is not in use.

Celebrate a special event in style by popping open a bottle of Mod Réserve Champagne By Drake. Hailing from the Vallée de la Marne region of France, this select champagne is made using only the best grapes around, for a truly unparalleled drinking experience.

Ski more comfortably than ever by going down the slopes in some DAHU ski boots. They are composed of comfy insulated rubber soles that are ideal for walking around town along with a tough Grilamid outer shell that you can easily step in and out of when needed.

Celebrate the creation of your tasty cup of coffee in the most grandiose way possible by holding this Lion King Simba mug proudly into the air. This officially licensed 3D mug features Simba’s cute mug along with two ear shaped handles.

The Vripack Rock Explorer Yacht is the ultra versatile and rugged yacht that’s being referred to as the “SUV of the seas”. It sports twin 1,000 HP Catterpillar C12 engines for a top speed of 16 knots and features a high straight bow that is ideal for traversing rough seas.

If you like to snack in the tub and aren’t a germophobe then you’ve got to visit this human hot pot hot spring! This incredible hot pot was created by the First World Hotel in anticipation of the Lunar New Year in Hangzhou, China.

Keep your partner from hogging your precious bed space by sleeping on the Ford Lane-Keeping smart bed. It employs the use of pressure sensors to identify when someone has strayed from their side of the bed and gently returns them using an integrated conveyor belt.

Show your furry friend some love by moving them inside this fabulous MDK9 dog house. Made from Brazilian teak, powder coated steel, and concrete, the home sports a contemporary design complete with interior lighting, a name plaque, and a comfy bed.

Drive with confidence no matter where you may roam by getting behind the wheel of the AddArmor bulletproof Cadillac Escalade. AddArmor specializes in transforming regular rides into rolling safe rooms that are impervious to ballistics.

As part of their most recent renovations, the Palms Casino Resort has introduced a couple of ultra lavish suites for high rollers – the Kingpin Suite and the Hardwood Suite. These opulent abodes offer killer views with amazing amenities like full-size bowling lanes.

Ensure you live to fight another day by arming yourself with these zombie apocalypse survival blades. Zombie Tools offers a vast collection of battle-ready weapons that range from double sided axes to a spear-like sword with a 20″ blade that is ideal for impaling the undead.

Throw your diet out the window and start your day the right way by overloading on carbs in the form of these fluffy little donut sticks from McDonald’s. They’re made from sweet golden-brown dough and topped off with cinnamon sugar for an unbeatable taste.

titleEN: The Smart Sun Following Solar Flower
content: Cut down your carbon footprint by going green with the smart sun following solar flower. Despite its fun novelty shape, this fully integrated all-in-one solar panel boasts an intelligent tracking system that automatically unfolds and directs its panels towards the direction of the sun.

This stunning and eye-catching omnidirectional motorcycle features a revolutionary design that forgoes traditional tires for a futuristic-looking spherical drive system that aims to add greater balance and freedom of movement to your riding.

Revolutionize your future BBQ’s with the Furrion Rova electric cooler. It comes with a built-in compressor that cools the main chamber down to -8F, a removable battery, an onboard charging station, and can retain ice for up to 10 days without power.

titleEN: Ripsaw Luxury Off Road Super Tank
content: Conquer the great outdoors with ease while behind the wheel of this luxurious off road tank. With a diesel engine pushing out 600 HP, the tank offers unmatched speed along with first class amenities such as leather seats and a touchscreen entertainment system.

Welcome to the exciting world of Plumbus ownership! A Plumbus will aid in many things in life, making life easier. With proper maintenance, handling, storage, and urging, Plumbus will provide you with a lifetime of better living and happiness.

If you enjoy old school Nintendo games, the Analogue Ghostly game console is a must-have. Apart from letting you play your favorite SNES cartridges on your modern TV, it comes with seven unique startup chimes and animations that you won’t find anywhere else.

If you simply hate ironing, then the Thanko shirt wrinkle remover is the appliance you need in your life! Simply place your shirt over the shirt-shaped plastic bag, turn on the compact blower at the bottom, and sit back while your shirt gets blow-dried to perfection!

Give your snail mail some added charm by personalizing your letters with a “WTF” wax seal. This unique and handcrafted seal features a circular brass “WTF” symbol that’s accented by a birch wood handle and also comes with enough red sealing wax for 50 envelopes.

The Project Valkyrie Superyacht is the ultra luxurious and massive 751-foot vessel guaranteed to make its billionaire owner king of the Seven Seas. It can hit 25 knots and features a sleek streamlined design that will offer unheard of deck space for its 52 lucky passengers.

Why settle for a mass produced model when you can own the road in one of these incredible Tarso Marques custom bikes? The former Formula One racer creates rolling works of art such as this stunning TMC Dumont which is powered by a literal aircraft engine.

These SLD laser headlights will let you see further and clearer than ever before when you drive at night. They’re one-tenth the size of regular lights and provide one hundred times the luminance of standard LEDs so that you can see up to one kilometer away!

This fuselage wilderness cabin conveniently transforms the most inhospitable of environments into home sweet home. Inspired by the principles of modern aerospace design, it provides a roomy interior and features a triple-layer insulated skin system that is ideal for any season.

If you’re a fan of sci-fi movies or the Terminator franchise you need this life-size T-800 endoskeleton in your home. This masterfully crafted officially licensed collectible stands at almost 80 inches tall and offers limited pose-ability for both forearms and fingers.

Ensure your entire crew makes it to the destination safe and sound by packing them all inside the Land Rover Flying Huntsman 6 x 6. This rugged beast can seat up to 9 passengers and runs on 6 knobby tires powered by a 2.2 -liter turbo diesel engine.

Keep daily tensions low by creating a tranquil atmosphere with this visually captivating backflow waterfall incense burner. Once it’s lit, a steady stream of smoke gently flows down to create a relaxing and entrancing smokey waterfall.

The Game Changer Yacht combines cutting-edge tech with lavish accommodations for a research vessel unlike any other. Apart from its opulent amenities, this 227-footer boasts a C-Researcher submarine, a Shotover 8K camera system, and is Arctic and Antarctic certified.

Kick it old school while by powering up your TV with the Pimoroni Picade console controller kit. This screen-less version of the Picade desktop arcade, allows you to game on your TV set. All you need is a Raspberry Pi, a micro SD card, an HDMI cable, and a power supply.

With this personalized noble painting you can immortalize yourself like royalty – even if you only have peasant’s blood coursing through your veins. The portrait unleashes your inner nobility by putting your face onto the regal body of a famous and dignified painting.

Maintaining your home’s elegant decor – even in the game room – using this glass foosball table. This hand-finished table comes with individually machined legs and adjustable feet, grooved wood control handles, and a crystal playing field with corner ramps.

titleEN: Game Of Thrones Steel Azure Window
content: After being swallowed up by the ocean in 2017, the iconic Game of Thrones landmark – the Azure Window – may rise again thanks to Hotei Russia/Svetozar Andreev Studio. They’re reconstructing this now famous landmark with a geometric stainless steel design.

Volkswagen is ushering the Dune Buggy into the new millennium with their upcoming electric model. Set to be unveiled at the Geneva Motor Show, this eco-friendly model will boast a door-less open-top design that’s sure to make them as fun as the originals.

The makers of Roomba are finally getting into the mowing game with their new iRobot automated lawn mowing robot. This compact little mower known, as the Terra robot mower, will boast the same Imprint Smart Mapping technology as its iconic vacuum counterpart.

If e-sports are your thing, the Razor Raptor 27 gaming monitor is an absolute must have! This unbeatable gaming monitor, rated at 400 with 420 nits is able to render deeper and richer blacks while displaying vivid colors in their full spectrum for paralleled results.

Turn every sneaker-head in your area green with envy when they see you in these Nike Air Max 1 grass sneakers. These unique kicks feature a distinctive white and faux grass colorway that will make you instantly noticeable wherever you go.

titleEN: Knightscope K7 All Terrain Security Robot
content: Ever wondered what it’d be like if you had Knightrider as your personal security system? The Knightscrope K7 all terrain security robot comes with an independent four-wheel system that allows it to rotate inward for a wide range of lateral movement.

Save yourself a trip to the bakery by whipping up a delicious and incredible looking cake in your own kitchen using this DIY kid’s birthday cake kit. Each kit includes everything you’ll need to easily make a deliciously whimsical cake that your kid is sure to love.

Profess your love in the most unnecessarily over-the-top way possible with the world’s most expensive flower bouquet! Inspired after the Cullinan diamond, the bouquet is sprinkled with real diamond dust and contains over 100 specially preserved flowers.

This World War II era train car has found new life as a cozy and rustic little Airbnb rental that makes for an unforgettable stay. This renovated train car comes with all the modern amenities you’d expect – including WiFi – and is large enough to accommodate up to four guests.

Battle the extreme cold with an equally extreme hot beverage – the 20 pound hot chocolate! This ginormous and incredibly sweet treat comes in a giant coffee mug that is topped off with a heaping helping of whipped cream along with some monster sized marshmallows.

The first rule of Fight Camp is you don’t talk about Fight Camp! Get combat ready by whipping your flabby body into shape with the FightCamp Smart Punching Bag. It’ll give you 24/7 access to a series of workouts and instructional videos that will produce noticeable results.

This winter, avoid freezing your fashionable little ankles off by keeping them bundled up with these hip ankle scarves. These stylish and totally necessary winter-time accessories will allow you to maintain your bold sockless look without succumbing to the frigid weather.

View one of our planet’s most spectacular displays from utmost comfort by booking a stay at the Snowman World Glass Resort. Each luxurious and cozy suite comes with all the comforts of home along with a massive front window that is perfect for gazing out at the night sky.

Condiment your juicy burger just like the one percent by topping it off with some Heinz Ketchup Caviar. Each of these 150 limited edition bottles comes filled with dozens of small and delectable pearls of intense flavor that will explode over your taste buds upon biting down.

Lounge around the house in comfort by slipping your feet into these Super Mario Piranha Plant slippers. The ingenious design of these comfy slippers makes them look just like a vicious Piranha Plant when they are stored inside their tube-shaped container.

If you’ve got the cash, this 1940 BMW 328 Roadster is a must-have for any serious car connoisseur. First introduced in the ’30s, the 328 went on to 100 class wins in 1937, making this sleek and curvy speedster not only a top tier ride but a true piece of automotive history.

Massage and relieve your sore muscles with a lightweight massage therapy courtesy of the Hyperice Volt! It features three speed settings that deliver up to 3200 percussions per minute, is ultra lightweight, and contains 4 different attachments!

Ensure the perfect fit throughout the entire game with the Nike Self-Lacing Adapt BB. Each sneaker comes with an app-assisted power-lacing system that lets you to quickly change their fit, allowing you to easily loosen them up during timeouts for added comfort.

Pimp out your creative space by upgrading your art room with My Drawing Board. This thoughtfully designed board comes with ample storage space for all your supplies while the drawing surface can be adjusted to 1 of 7 different angles for maximum comfort.

Set yourself apart from the average audiophile by creating your very own personalized vinyl record. The process is simple – just select the songs and cover artwork you desire and Vinylify will then bundle it into an actual playable record you can own!

Reimagine what you thought was possible on snow by hitting the slopes on the Sno-Go Bike. It can be adjusted to accommodate riders ranging from 5’2″ to 6’1″ while the bold design provides for greater stability and control as you bomb your favorite hills.

Guarantee nothing happens to your pricey smartphone while you’re out adventuring by placing it inside the Pelican Go G40 case. This IP67 rated case features a heavy duty abrasion and impact-proof ABS outer shell that’s also dustproof and waterproof up to 1.5 meters.

titleEN: Fallout T-51 Power Armor USB Hub
content: Keep your electronic devices powered up like a true Wastelander by plugging them into this Fallout T-51 power armor USB hub. Designed like a highly detailed T-51 with a Sugar Bombs paint job, this pint-sized action figure is actually a handy USB hub with 4 ports.
Get name brand high quality knives such as Kershaw, SOG, CRKT, SPYDER CO, BUCK delivered direct to your doorstep each and every month that are yours to keep with the Monthly Knife Club!

McLaren has recently unveiled their newest luxury ride -the 600LT Spider convertible – and it it looks amazing! It boasts a revised twin-turbocharged 3.8-liter V8 along with a seven-speed gearbox that will let you do 0 to 60 in under 3 seconds and reach a top speed of 201 mph.

Root for your favorite team in utmost comfort by watching the big game sitting on this giant baseball glove armchair. The creative design of this massive leather glove makes it a perfect addition to any den, living room, or mancave.

Own The Elements – twelve unique wearable elements for the adventurous and the curious. Choose from Titanium, Tungsten, Copper, Gold and many more. Each bracelet is machined, assembled and personalized in the UK.

Meet adventure head-on while behind the wheel of this Jeep Wrangler Rubicon 6×6 SUV. This off-roading giant is powered by a supercharged 6.2-liter V8 and features a customized chassis built to accommodate 6 massive wheels and a pickup bed.

Don’t let “fear of labels” stop you from being romantic on Valentine’s Day. With the “It’s Complicated” Valentine’s Day card, you can show that special someone that you are thinking about them, but it’s totally not a big deal or anything. Whatever.

Explore the deep from the safety of land by setting this RoboShark underwater robot loose in the ocean. Measuring 6.5-feet long, this high-tech shark comes with a built-in obstacle avoidance system, can dive down nearly 1000 feet deep, and is able to swim at 10 knots.

Give new meaning to staying warm and toasty by snuggling up with this toast heated pillow. This ultra squishy and adorable little pillow can be easily charged via a USB cable and will remain warm for up to four hours making him the ideal for the winter months.

The Straprack is a home fitness gym that combines a full VKR and suspended strap training in one compact and foldable package that takes up zero floor space, won’t damage your door frame, and won’t ever fall off. Working out has never been this easy!

The underwater camping tent is going to revolutionize scuba diving. This underwater base camp will allow divers to dive deeper and longer by providing them a safe space to eat and rest without having to ascend all the way up to the surface.

titleEN: Dungeon In A Box RPG Subscription Box
content: Get serious about your D&D by gathering your posse around this Dungeon in a Box RPG subscription box. This geeky treasure chest comes packed with all sorts of goodies like a 24″ x 18″ battle map, monster tokens, a 24-page adventure book, and more!

Dinnerly is the meal plan service that provides delicious ingredients and tasty recipes for just $4.99 per person! You’ll receive a box stuffed with six ingredients of your choice so that you can conveniently whip up simple and tasty meals on a nightly basis.

Afloat is the modern waterbed for the new millennium. The bed’s water compartment is designed with a loose fit and is covered by a special stretch fabric and topped off with a soft memory foam cover that will conform to your body so that you sleep as snug as a newborn.

If you prefer retractable pens over a snap-cap pens this is the pen for you! You push down on the clip with your thumb and the middle button pops up with a satisfying click. To retract the pen, push on the middle button and it springs back up. How it works is a secret.

This futuristic spaceship home will make you feel like you’ve departed Earth and are aboard a ship hurtling through space. This remarkable abode is composed of 3 prefabricated modules placed 4 meters off the ground with an airplane staircase entrance.

Use your coffee breaks to ponder over the constant pain and suffering that is life by sipping your brew form this Mr. Meeseeks 3D mug. The neat three-dimensional design makes it look like you’re drinking your hot beverage straight out of Mr. Meeseeks’s head.

Moving around the sprawling golf course is easier and more fun than ever before when you hop aboard the CycleBoard golf scooter. This compact all-terrain ride can reach 14 mph and boasts a lean-to-steer system that makes piloting this scooter a breeze.

Indulge in a little Mary Jane without succumbing to her intoxicatingly groovy effects by sipping on Winabis – the cannabis flavored wine. It features a striking green hue and doesn’t contain any THC meaning you can drink it without fear of getting stoned, just really drunk.

titleEN: Full Scale Labyrinth Door Knocker Set
content: Pay homage to one of the best sci-fi flicks of all time by outfitting your home’s entrance with this imposing full scale Labyrinth door knocker set. These large and ornate door knockers where made using the actual screen-used props to ensure maximum authenticity.

The 1940s Belly Tank Lakester race car was built from a WWII-era aircraft drop tank and a Ford Model T frame. Apart from the unique and sci-fi-like exterior, this recently restored ride is powered by a V8-60 flathead with twin Stromberg 81 carburetors.

After a long absence, the iconic Motorola Razr is making a comeback! While details on this new and improved Motorola Razr smartphone are still scarce, it will sport a retro folding design and is rumored to hit the market sometime later this year.

Make your daily commute more efficient and entertaining than ever by transforming your plain shoes into roller skates using these custom clip-ons. They conveniently clip on to the soles of your sneakers so that you can skate all over your concrete jungle.

The Lamborghini Huracan Evo Coupe seamlessly blends performance, beauty, and technology. It boasts an updated exterior for improved aerodynamics and an 8.4” touchscreen system that lets you control the car and entertainment functions with your fingertips.

Instantly turn any deck into an electric skateboard using this bolt-on electric skateboard motor. This ultra light and compact powertrain kit is compatible with any type of deck and trunks and has a range of fifteen miles with a top speed of twenty-two miles per hour.

Spice up your love life by making yourself irresistible with these edible fragrances. These vegan-friendly fragrances are made with a combination of hand-picked fruit and flowers and are available in intoxicatingly delicious scents like ‘tropical and tempting watermelon”.

titleEN: Escape Vista Tiny Home On Wheels
content: Why settle down in just one place when you can have the world? This Escape Vista tiny home on wheels makes it possible to easily pick up and go from spot to spot without having to forfeit any of life’s modern conveniences or amenities.

With food waste accounting of 8% of global warming, cut down your carbon footprint by up-cycling your food waste with the smart insect farm. Now you’ll easily be able to turn your kitchen scraps and leftovers into fertilizer and mealworm protein.

Koenigsegg is taking the car world by storm with the unrivaled Naked Carbon Regera. This powerful 1500+ horsepower plug-in hybrid boasts a carbon fiber exterior with the epoxy coating painstakingly removed by hand and polished down to the raw carbon fiber.

The premier smoking accessory is available at last. The Omni comes with 8 tools, individually crafted from steel and aluminum: lever-action grinder, storage, hemp-wick, screens, scraper, poker, press, and mini lighter. A must-have for pipe smokers.

Cruising around your urban jungle is more efficient and fun than ever when you hop aboard the CycleBoard standup electric scooter. This three-wheeled scooter provides an incredibly smooth and eco-friendly ride powerful enough to take on the steepest of hills.

titleEN: Gourmet Bacon Of The Month Club
content: Show your favorite carnivore just how much you love them by signing them up for the gourmet bacon of the month club. After signing up for Bacon Scouts, you’ll receive a monthly care package containing two packs of mouth-watering premium bacon.

Give your glorious manly mane some added curb appeal by prettying it up with your very own beard bouquet. This quirky yet fabulous accessory contains nine small and vibrant red roses that you can clip on seamlessly to your beard.

Assemble your model of the future, today with this Fallout 76 Pip-Boy 2000 construction kit. Upon opening up the red metallic toolbox kit, you’ll find over 150 separate parts so that you can build your very own Pip-Boy 2000 like a true Wastelander.

BATHSPHERE is the glass sphere bathtub by Alexander Zhukovsky that aims to revolutionize the way you view a soak in the tub. It allows you to alter everything from temperature to humidity while the hanging spherical design creates a sense of weightlessness.

Tourbillon watches were once only for millionaires. Now, for the first time ever, Tourbillon watches are accessible to us all! Apart from the 100% Tourbillion movement, they feature a semi-exposed mechanism that allows you to partially to see the watch’s inner workings.

Make your mouth water by filling your home with the one and only aroma of the Colonel’s gravy by lighting up this KFC gravy scented candle. This unique candle was given out to the very lucky winner of a contest held by the famous chicken themed fast food chain.

Where do you see yourself in ten years? The Decade Planner is the totally unique calendar that is capable of holding 10 years’ worth of calendars inside its ample and skillfully designed scroll – making it easier than ever to visualize and plan long term goals.

Be prepared when the zombie apocalypse hits your town with this fully loaded zombie survival crate. With everything from a real machete and packaged Twinkies included in this kit, you’ll have everything you need to travel light while eliminating the local zombie threat.

Perform an effective and exhilarating workout without requiring a mountain of equipment by grabbing a hold of the KettlebellConnect smart kettlebell. This high-tech kettlebell allows you to effortlessly alter its weight between 12 and 43 pounds in under 3 seconds!

Here’s a crazy new way to spray champagne that makes it even more fun and with less mess! The Bubbly Blaster is made for durable high-quality aluminum and brass and attaches to any champagne bottle, turning it into a long-lasting champagne cannon!

It looks like beef, and it tastes like beef – but it ain’t beef! The plant-based “impossible burger” is here to change the way you think about veggie burgers. They taste great and require 95% less land, 74% less water, and 87% less greenhouse gas emissions to create.

This nifty Nintendo Game Boy watch is the ideal timepiece for the gamer in your life. This neat little digital watch is styled just like a miniature replica of the iconic portable gaming device – complete with a D-Pad, buttons, and a Super Mario Land themed alarm.

Ensure you’re ready for whatever Old Man Winter throws your way by suiting up in one of these Kelvin heated jackets. Each jacket is fitted with a rechargeable 5200 mAh Li-ion battery that provides power to 5 distinct warming zones that are scattered throughout the torso.

After 17 long years Toyota is bringing back the iconic Supra. Apart from its sleek updated design, the new Toyota GR Supra boasts a 3.0-liter twin-scroll turbocharged inline six with 335 horsepower, a 0 to 60 time of just 4.1 seconds, and a top speed of 155 mph.

Five minutes with the Super Anthony fighting robot and you’ll be hooked on the high-tech sport of robot fighting. This tough little guy comes with 15 steel-grade high-resolution IQ516HV servomotors capable of producing an impressive 99 pounds of punch force.

Ensure you never have to go far to refill your wine glass by placing this wine storage coffee table in your living room. This eye-catching piece comes with a built-in wine rack that is large enough to store up to 84 bottles of your favorite vino.

Transform your bathroom going experience by replacing your old school porcelain throne with the Kohler Numi 2.0 intelligent toilet. This imposing toilet comes with high-tech features like built-in speakers, ambient lighting, and a heated toilet seat for ultimate comfort.

If the mass produced Ikea styled furniture isn’t to your liking, feast your eyes on this gorgeous petrified wood coffee table! This prehistoric piece features rich hues of natural brown and black, is resistant to weathering, and is inlaid with Philippine Petrified Wood.

titleEN: The Simple Set Up Saltwater Aquarium
content: The simple set up saltwater aquarium takes all the hard work out of maintaining your very own aquarium. It provides you with simple instructions so that you can assemble a perfectly balanced saltwater ecosystem without having to invest of a lot of time on research.

Improvise, Adapt, and Overcome! The GY6 AR15 Survival Mag is the first and ONLY magazine to be combined with a Survival Kit. This unique survival mag holds 10 rounds of 5.56/.223 ammo, is 50 state legal, size of a 30 round mag, and contains a Survival Kit.

Get a front row seat to some of planet Earth’s most breathtaking vistas by spending some time inside one of these day trip egg cabins. These Norwegian cabins offer over 150 square feet along with a fireplace and cozy seating so you can take in the magnificent views nearby.

Cadillac has given us a glimpse at the future of electric SUVs with the unveiling of their EV Crossover. These next generation vehicles will be the new face of the upcoming lineup of electric vehicles which will be launching in the years to come.

Become the envy of every Imperial loyalist by adding this life size Stormtrooper statue to your collection. Modeled after the original trilogy Stormtroopers, this jaw-dropping statue stands at 6.5′ and is crafted from fiberglass, resin, and high quality plastic.

Cut down on clutter by replacing all your bulky grilling utensils with the Grill X multi-BBQ tool. This versatile tool’s unique design allows you to use it as either a knife, a grill fork, a spatula, a bottle opener, a razor sharp knife, barbecue tongs, or even a wine corkscrew.

With their eye on the future, Harley Davidson is entering the e-bike game with their LiveWire e-bike prototype. Instead of the classic v-twin engine, this eco-friendly ride will boast brushless DC motors and a simpler more lightweight design ideal for the concrete jungle.

Hang out with your favorite loud-mouthed merc anytime you want by adding this life size Deadpool replica statue to your collection. This masterfully crafted statue looks so real that you’ll think he’s jumped right out of the screen and into your home.

Kevin is the pocket-size self-defense handgun that is specially designed for close range use – making it a great option for everyday protection. This stealthy 0.38 handgun boasts a shooting range of 15 meters with a capacity for 7 rounds.

Transform your wall into a canvas for illumination using this one-of-a-kind touch sensitive modular lighting system. The system is composed of a series of plastic hexagons that you can interlock via magnets and activate individually with a tap of your finger.

Safe and efficient urban air travel may be coming to the masses sooner rather than later if the newly unveiled Nexus Flying Air Taxi is any indicator. Though still in its early stages, this hydro electric air taxi is projected to hit the skies by 2025.

The Runge RS is everything a late 1950s racer should be. This gorgeous ride features a curvaceous body design that pulls from the RSK and Spyder racers blended with Maserati and Ferrari styling cues to create an automobile that will turn heads wherever it goes.

Create a pleasant and inviting environment for bees to thrive and prosper in by installing these bee brick bee houses. These cleverly designed little bee houses feature a rustic and understated brick-like design that makes them ideal for virtually any backyard.

Give your dull meaningless life some joy with this giant inflatable Pickle Rick! This large inflatable comes plastered with Rick’s gorgeous mug, inflates in a snap, and stands approximately six feet tall, making this the perfect mascot for your next big party.

Aviar is the Russian company that’s ushering American muscle into the future with their R67 electric muscle car. This eco-friendly Mustang boasts all-wheel drive, a lightweight carbon fiber bodywork styled like the classic ’67 Mustang, and does 0-62 in just 2.2 seconds.

Whoever said fashion can’t be both functional and stunning clearly never laid their eyes on these human skin high heels. The visionaries at Fecal Matter behind these heels say they’re interned to make a statement about social media ideals and body modification.

titleEN: The World’s Most Advanced Charcoal Grill
content: Step up your grilling game by upgrading to the world’s most advanced charcoal grill. It features a unique design that provides unparalleled airflow control while also functioning as a slow cooker, smoker, and even an oven than can cook a pizza in just 2 minutes!

Welcome to the future of portable gaming! The Area-51 laptop from Alienware is the insanely powerful 17″ gaming laptop that will offer unmatched levels of customization – letting you replace, upgrade, and customize different components to your specifications.

Elon Musk’s The Boring Company is looking to cut down travel time with the Loop subterranean transport system. Cars would be lowered into a tunnel where a retractable wheel gear and rail system would safely propel them through underground tunnels at speeds of 150 mph.

This repurposed tuba bathroom sink takes music appreciation to an entirely new level. Reddit user marc_urzz shared this incredible this one-of-a-kind bathroom sink in his step-uncle’s bathroom that was made from an actual tuba!

Take your obsession to new and super comfy heights by immortalizing your furry friend with these personalized pet slippers. Simply submit a photo of your four legged family member and then receive a pair of comfortable, snuggly, and insanely cute sippers.

See what living in paradise is really like by booking a stay at this Maldives private island resort. This bucket-list-worthy tropical slice of heaven caters to your every whim to provide a truly unforgettable experience that you won’t ever want to end.

Take mealtime to another level by elevating your nutritional habits with Foodini – the 3D food printer. This high-tech kitchen accessory allows you to easily print your food into precise portions and shapes so that you can layer them to build edible 3D creations.

Great Scott, check out this insane DeLorean hovercraft! This eye-catching custom hovercraft can hover around 8 inches above any flat surface and boasts a lightweight body composed of Styrofoam, wrapped in fiberglass, and coated in metallic paint.

Improve your gift’s curb appeal by wrapping it up in this mouth-watering sausage scented wrapping paper from Jimmy Dean. It’s available in three colorful holiday inspired designs that each release the intoxicating smell of hot sizzling sausages when you scratch their surface.

The Elroy Passenger Drone is looking to make your daily commute simpler and more enjoyable than ever before. Simply input your destination on the touchscreen, sit back, and enjoy the amazing views as Elroy flies you to where you need to go in record time.

Set your gift apart from the rest under the Christmas tree by wrapping your goodies with this personalized gift wrapping paper. You’ll conveniently be able to create your own custom wrapping paper and stationary displaying the face of your choice.

Keep Rex entertained for hours without tiring yourself out by using the ball launching canine cannon for your next game of fetch. With this blaster you’ll easily be able to launch tennis balls up to 30 feet way without blowing out your rotator cuff.

Whip up mouth-watering Neapolitan-style pies from the comfort of your kitchen with the Breville smart pizza oven. It reaches temperatures of 750°F and maintains the ideal baking environment for melty pizzas with the signature char and leopard spotting on the crust.

Pay homage to the city you love with these city wood maps. Handmade wood city maps with the highest quality of detailing. Crafted with a laser cut precision that allows you to see a 3D version of the city streets and waterways so that you can discover your city again.

Auto customization specialists Emory Motorsports are turning heads with their prized 1960 Porsche 356. This stunning beauty boasts a 3.6L 964 engine, 5-speed transmission, and was commissioned by the the iconic musician John Oats.

Keep yourself nice and toasty during a long workday by laying out this adorable corgi butt USB heated pillow. These cute little USB corgi butt pillows will last for up to six hours on a single charge so your tushy will remain warm and comfy!

Become a liquor connoisseur by having some of the world’s best brands delivered right to your doorstep. Try from a variety of liquor sampling boxes including gin, rum, whiskey. Enjoy free shipping and live tasting events.

Connect with nature in a sophisticated manner by booking a stay at the Domes Charlevoix luxury cabins. This stunning and secluded cabin provides all the comforts of home and is perched mountainside in the forest of Canada’s Petite-Rivière-Saint-François region.

The Pan/Tilt Minibot is the adventure-ready robot that will tackle rough terrains and all while being controlled wirelessly. It boasts a lightweight yet sturdy aircraft-grade aluminum frame, can travel at up to 4 mph, and can climb up to an inline of 30 degrees.

With these hilarious and cuddly personalized voodoo dolls getting sweet revenge on anyone who has wronged you has never been so easy. All you need to do is upload a photo of the poor soul you want to torment with your black magic.

The Panasonic Wear Space is essentially a horse blinder for people. The device helps block out background noise as well as your peripheral vision – so that you can easily cut out all distractions and concentrate on your work.

The Arc Vector is the world’s most advanced electric motorcycle! The bike is comprised of three parts – the motorcycle itself, a smart helmet with on-board HUD, and haptic body armor that can vibrate to physically alert you of possible hazards on the road.

Breaking Bad may be long gone but luckily you can still get you hands on Heisenberg’s best stuff. Prop store is auctioning off a large ziplock bag chock-full of the blue stuff, which is comprised of various sizes and shades of crystallized rock candy that has been dyed blue.

Instantly create a warm and inviting ambiance in any part of your home with the Travelmate ethanol fireplace. The innovative and functional suit-case-like design allows you to easily pick it up and set it in virtually any part of your home.

With the Nomad Base station hub you’ll be able to effortlessly and wirelessly charge up to 4 devices simultaneously. It features 3 high-power coils so you can charge up to 2 devices at a maximum of 10W each and a USB-A port that provides up to an extra 7.5W.

Samsung is looking to revolutionize the smartphone game with their new foldable smartphone – the Samsung Galaxy X. The new phone boasts an Infinity Flex Display that allows you to extend the screen and convert your phone into a 7.3″ mini tablet.

Ride the roughest and most rugged terrain without fear of getting a flat by upgrading to these bulletproof bike inner tubes. They feature a revolutionary construction made up of a high-nitrogen micro-matrix of proprietary elastomers that gives them a super lightweight feel.

Keep the game going long after the sun goes down by setting up this basketball hoop light in your home court. The rim comes fitted with 90 super bright LEDs that are activated by your shooting and can be set to dozens of eye-catching vibrant patterns.

Everyone has a plumbus in their home! Ensure your have the coolest Christmas tree in the multiverse by decorating it with this plumbus ornament. This all-purpose home device is specially made for the holidays – now with a double coating of fleeb juice!

Play your favorite old school games anytime and anywhere with the Pixel Vision 2.0 handheld gaming device. It features a design reminiscent of the Game Boy Advance SP and it can store up to 10,000 classic games!

Building your very own master PC with an internal cooling system is now more convenient than ever when you use these modular liquid cooling products. They’re designed around Quick Disconnect Couplings so that you can easily choose which specific component to cool.

These Star Wars themed scented candle sets provide a truly unique way to pay homage to the iconic original trilogy. Each set commemorates one of the films with 5 uniquely scented candles like “Wookie”, “banthers milk” and “trash compactor”.

Experience the freedom of the open road like never before by hitting the pavement behind the wheel of the 2019 Vanderhall Carmel Roaster. This speedy little number features a 6-speed automatic transmission and a 1.5-liter GM turbocharged 4-cylinder engine.

titleEN: Planters Mr. IPA-Nut Peanut Flavored Beer
content: What better way to complement your side bowl of cashews than by washing them down with some Mr. IPA-Nut peanut flavored beer. This refreshing IPA features a citrusy aroma with hints of honey-roasted nuts topped off with a slightly salty aftertaste.

As the ultra stylish Land Ark Tiny house RV shows, home isn’t just where the heart is, it’s also where you park it. Despite its small size, the home makes excellent use of its limited space to provide enough room for up to four people to live comfortably.
